level.text: A party may request that an Administrative Law Judge decide a case summarily, without an evidentiary hearing. Such a motion must include sufficient evidence of undisputed facts and citation of controlling legal authority.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 6399 (June 25, 2004); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12541, 12555 (December 31, 2010).
